TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UIPropertyMetadata extends System.Windows.PropertyMetadata

summary.span: 為在核心層級上具有呈現/使用者介面影響的非架構屬性提供屬性中繼資料 (Metadata)。

span.span: Provides property metadata for non-framework properties that do have rendering/user interface impact at the core level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks （衍生自這個類別） 是常見的中繼資料類別，也用於架構層級屬性會影響呈現/使用者介面。 (derived from this class) is the more common metadata class used for framework-level properties that also have rendering/user interface impact.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object defaultValue) cil managed

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 相依性屬性的預設值，通常是做為某些特定型別的值提供。

span.span: The default value of the dependency property, usually provided as a value of some specific type.

summary.span: 使用該屬性的指定預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the specified default value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback propertyChangedCallback) cil managed

param.name: propertyChangedCallback
param.span: 處理常式實作的參考，當屬性的有效值變更時會由屬性系統呼叫。

span.span: Reference to a handler implementation that is to be called by the property system whenever the effective value of the property changes.

summary.span: 使用指定的 PropertyChanged 回呼，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the specified PropertyChanged callback.

param.span: 處理常式實作的參考，當屬性的有效值變更時會由屬性系統呼叫。

span.span: Reference to a handler implementation that is to be called by the property system whenever the effective value of the property changes.

param.span: 處理常式實作的參考，當屬性的有效值變更時會由屬性系統呼叫。

span.span: Reference to a handler implementation that is to be called whenever the property system calls against this property.

summary.span: 使用指定的預設值和回呼，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: public UIPropertyMetadata (object defaultValue, System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback propertyChangedCallback, System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback coerceValueCallback, bool isAnimationProhibited);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object defaultValue, class System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback propertyChangedCallback, class System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback coerceValueCallback, bool isAnimationProhibited) cil managed

public: UIPropertyMetadata(System::Object ^ defaultValue, System::Windows::PropertyChangedCallback ^ propertyChangedCallback, System::Windows::CoerceValueCallback ^ coerceValueCallback, bool isAnimationProhibited);

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 相依性屬性的預設值，通常是做為某些特定型別的值提供。

span.span: The default value of the dependency property, usually provided as a value of some specific type.

param.name: propertyChangedCallback
param.span: 處理常式實作的參考，當屬性的有效值變更時會由屬性系統呼叫。

span.span: Reference to a handler implementation that is to be called by the property system whenever the effective value of the property changes.

param.name: coerceValueCallback
param.span: 處理常式實作的參考，當屬性系統針對這個屬性呼叫 時便會呼叫。

span.span: Reference to a handler implementation that is to be called whenever the property system calls against this property.

param.name: isAnimationProhibited
param.span: 設定為 可防止屬性系統為套用這個中繼資料的屬性顯示動畫。

span.span: Set to to prevent the property system from animating the property that this metadata is applied to.

param.span: 如果嘗試顯示這類屬性的動畫，則這類屬性會引發執行階段例外狀況 (Exception)。

span.span: Such properties will raise run time exceptions if animations of them are attempted.
The default is .

summary.span: 使用指定的預設值和回呼，以及用於停用屬性動畫的布林值 (Boolean)，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the specified default value and callbacks, and a Boolean used to disable animations on the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAnimationProhibited { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值宣告是否應停用套用包含中繼資料執行個體之相依性屬性上的動畫。

span.span: Gets or sets a value declaring whether animations should be disabled on the dependency property where the containing metadata instance is applied.

value.span: 表示不允許動畫， 表示允許動畫。

span.span: indicates that animations are disallowed; indicates that animations are allowed.
The default is (animations allowed).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，預設相依性屬性用於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]架構實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]可以動畫顯示。In general, the default dependency properties available in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework implementation [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] can be animated. 您可能會將此屬性設定為`true`動畫停用您自己自訂的相依性屬性的中繼資料中。You might set this property to `true` in the metadata of your own custom dependency property to disable animations on it. 如果此值的屬性`true`嘗試用作動畫目標，執行階段例外狀況就會引發。If a property with this value `true` attempts to be used as an animation target, a runtime exception will be raised. 任何屬性衍生的類別通常定義為讀寫物件模型中。Properties on any derived classes of are normally defined in the object model as read-write. 這是讓可在執行個體的初始設定之後加以調整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 不過，一旦一部分的呼叫會使用中繼資料， ，或屬性系統將密封該中繼資料執行個體，傳遞的中繼資料的任何屬性現在會被視為不變。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and any properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. 嘗試設定一旦是`true`此中繼資料執行個體將會引發例外狀況。Attempting to set once is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception.
